Name: position
Description: 0 means open, 100 means closed

Name: position
Description: 0 means open, 100 means closed

Name: name
Description: a unique name for the passcode. duplicates under the same device are not allowed.

Name: type
Description: type of the passcode.
OptionsDescription: a permanent passcode.|a temporary passcode.|a one-time passcode.|an emergency passcode.

Name: password
Description: a 6 to 12-digit passcode in plain text

Name: startTime
Description: set the time the passcode becomes valid from, mandatory for one-time passcode and temporary passcode. a 10-digit timestamp.If minus 1 is specified, it is treated as unspecified.

Name: endTime
Description: set the time the passcode becomes expired, mandatory for one-time passcode and temporary passcode. a 10-digit timestamp.If minus 1 is specified, it is treated as unspecified.

Name: id
Description: the id of the passcode
